name: Damaged Control (Demo)
description:
You're contracted to help shut down a dam before it's removed from a river. It's an old place, with memories and thoughts captured within its walls. But sometimes the past must be let go. 

Controls:
WASD—Movement
Mouse—Look Around
Hold Right Mouse Button—Use Radio
E—Interact with Objects

Made for the LD48 game jam theme, "Deeper and deeper."
